image_gallery.name: A beautiful house
image_gallery.description: A unique combination of Indian Uthappam (pancake) and Italian pizza, topped with Cerignola olives, ripe vine cherry tomatoes, Vidalia onion, Guntur chillies and Buffalo Paneer.

image_gallery.name: A wonderful panoramic view
image_gallery.description: Deep fried Zucchini coated with mildly spiced Chickpea flour batter accompanied with a sweet-tangy tamarind sauce

image_gallery.name: The central square of Aristi
image_gallery.description: A quintessential ConFusion experience, is it a vada or is it a donut?

image_gallery.name: Another view of the central square
image_gallery.description: A delectable, semi-sweet New York Style Cheese Cake, with Graham cracker crust and spiced with Indian cardamoms

comments.comment: This is like a God miracle
comments.author: Michael Jaikishan

comments.comment: It's your birthday, we're gonna party!
comments.author: 25 Cent

comments.comment: Imagine all the eatables, living in conFusion!
comments.author: John Lemon

comments.comment: Sends anyone to heaven, I wish I could get my mother-in-law to eat it!
comments.author: Paul McVites
